categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace actors

nodes.text: Bronagh Gallagher (born April 26, 1972) is a singer and actress who portrayed Captain Maoi Madakor in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.

In 1999, Bronagh Gallagher worked on Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace. She was the second character to speak, after Qui-Gon Jinn pronounced the first line: "Captain?" she replied, "Yes, Sir?". She was the pilot of the Radiant VII cruiser, who would later be known as Captain Karol or Captain Madakor in the Expanded Universe. Her character would die soon after Qui-Gon's meeting with Nute Gunray when the craft was destroyed by the Trade Federation.
